alert.note: Alert for Flathead; Lake (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued August 16 at 12:05PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT... The Montana Department of Environmental Quality has issued an air quality alert for Flathead and Lake counties in effect until 12PM 8/17/2023 elevated particulate levels from wildfire smoke This alert will be updated again at 1200pm 8/17/2023. An Air Quality Alert means that particulates have been trending upwards and that an exceedence of the 24 hour National Ambient Air Quality Standard (NAAQS) has occurred or may occur in the near future. As of 11AM, Particulate levels in Columbia Falls are Moderate When air quality is Moderate... State and local health officials recommend that unusually sensitive people should consider reducing prolonged or heavy exertion. For more information visit the Montana Department of Environmental Quality at http://todaysair.mtdeq.us
